p.s:
Think it 's going to be
boring
?
Do n't worry , this article will show you how to have a fun and memorable time .

item.s: Find a park or lake that rents out paddle boats .
If you own a paddle boat , skip this step .
Before renting one check the place you 're renting out from in advance .
Check for ducks ( they can carry swimmer 's itch ) , dead fish , etc.
Check the paddle boats to make sure they 're not falling apart and are in good condition .
Find friends or loved ones to go with !
It 's never fun to paddle boat alone .
Talk to them about their schedules , and when they 're open .
Consider splitting the price .
Tell them what they need to bring - bathing suit , towels , sunscreen , etc.
Before going paddle boating , gather the supplies you 'll need .
Water bottles , towels , etc.
Make sure to bring more than you need in case someone 's forgotten to bring it .
Go and pick up your friends and or loved ones and drive to your destination !

list.item:
When you get there , have one person pay for renting or place your boat near the water .
It 's generally considered polite for you to do this .
Now get dressed and put on some sun screen .

item.s: Choose the two people that are going to be paddling first .
Decide how you 're going to rotate through the seats .
Let the people sitting in the back go first , then the paddlers .

Have the people in the front back up and head for the
middle
of the lake .

If you 're the people in the back , look for fish , go leach searching , let your feet drag in the water , just have
fun
!
Soon you 'll be paddling , so enjoy the time that you have to kick back and relax !
Switch every every ten minutes or so , and stay fair .
An argument would ruin your boating trip .
If you 're the person in the front , ask everybody where they want to go .
If there are children on the boat , pretend you 're a pirate captain , and say things like " Land ho !
" or other pirate sayings .
Chat !
Even if your paddling . if you do n't know what to say , say something like , " Is n't it hot out ?
" or " How was it at work today ?
" However , make sure to let everybody talk , so no one feels left out .

If possible , bring a
waterproof
camera with you .
You can make a scrapbook !

If you do n't have a
waterproof
camera with you , do n't bring it .
If you drop it , and it 's not waterproof , it will break and possibly sink .
Have fun paddle boating !
Always wear a life jacket , even if you can swim .
In some places it is n't legal to paddle boat without a life jacket , and it 's safer anyway .

list.item:
If someone wants to stop paddling , let them walk out of the boat .
Never
move the boat when their walking , or they 'll fall in and might be hurt or upset .

item.s: Make sure you tell somebody where you 're going first just in case something happens .

list.item:
Always
keep a close eye on children .

Never
bring any electronics with you , unless they 're waterproof .
